name: Heroic Echo
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You can cast this spell as a response to a creature making an attack roll without advantage. After the attack resolves, a mighty spirit makes the same attack against the same targets with advantage, dealing an additional 4d6 damage on hit. The target creature then recovers 1 AP.

A creature can only be affected by this spell once on each of their turns. Damage dealt by this spell is treated as if the target creature had dealt the damage.
